1579728135_1NZftAz9VSawGF5JgMYGFv4ByoKEa.body:
You should not suddenly abandon those drinks.
Lower the daily volume by 20℅, after 4 days another 20% falls. Your body should get used slowly.
Go down a little every week and after 2 months you decide whether to leave those drinks or drink too little.
You need concentration and willpower.
Strength and move on.
